description: The course would broadly cover the entrepreneurial environment, organizing and operating the venture, planning for the future, creating and recognizing venture value, structuring financing for the growing venture and finally the exit and turnaround strategies. Among these broad six areas, there would be specific content and deliverables.
name: MDL802 Entrepreneurial Finance
pre: MSL707 and 708 for MBA students, MSL302 for B.Tech. Students
